name: politico
text:
Well, here we go again. Lawmakers appear stuck on a Covid-relief bill as we sink deeper into the pandemic. It's pretty much where we've been for months. 

The big sticking points? Liability reform, state & local government assistance and direct payments. https://t.co/gSG6D0YiHv

name: politico
text:
There's one big question on people's minds: Will whatever relief bill Congress hammers out include a stimulus check?

Trump is pushing hard to have the payments included in any deal. And despite past opposition, McConnell likely won't stand in the way.
https://t.co/2ZY7EfpPqH

name: politico
text: The U.K. is the first Western country to start a mass vaccination program after regulators authorized the use of a Pfizer/BioNTech injection last week. U.S. and E.U. regulators may approve the vaccine in coming days, fueling a global immunization effort.  https://t.co/rRsosoGGpZ https://t.co/MZLa6li2A9

name: politico
text: Britain has received 800,000 doses of the vaccine, enough for 400,000 people. The first shots will go to people over 80 who are either hospitalized or already have outpatient appointments scheduled, along with nursing home workers and vaccination staff. https://t.co/rRsosoGGpZ https://t.co/LyqSazITgo

name: politico
text:
Welp. Lawmakers won‚Äôt finish work on a massive omnibus spending deal this week. 

Instead, the House will vote tomorrow on a one-week continuing resolution, followed soon after by the Senate. The current funding runs dry at midnight on Friday.
https://t.co/wf0kgdlMQo

text:

name: politico
text:
As the U.S. hurtles toward 15 million cases of the coronavirus, the U.K. has started its immunization efforts. 

Using data from the COVID Tracking Project, we‚Äôre following how each state is responding to Covid-19. Here's where we stand this morning üëá https://t.co/r0HDQiaN3Z https://t.co/VJRLyc1KwE

name: politico
text: The data isn‚Äôt perfect. Since the CDC isn‚Äôt publicly releasing the number of people who have been tested, The COVID Tracking Project is pulling data from state health departments, which can vary in the way they report tests and infections.¬†https://t.co/r0HDQiaN3Z https://t.co/0e3S9ct0AU

name: politico
text:
